verses.verse: But there will be no <WH3808> [more] gloom <WH4155> for her who <WH834> was in anguish; <WH4164> in earlier <WH7223> times <WH6256> He treated <WH7043> the land <WH776> of Zebulun <WH2074> and the land <WH776> of Naphtali <WH5321> with contempt, <WH7043> but later <WH314> on He shall make <WH3513> [it] glorious, <WH3513> by the way <WH1870> of the sea, <WH3220> on the other <WH5676> side <WH5676> of Jordan, <WH3383> Galilee <WH1551> of the Gentiles. <WH1471>

The people <WH5971> who walk <WH1980> in darkness <WH2822> Will see <WH7200> a great <WH1419> light; <WH216> Those who live <WH3427> in a dark <WH6757> land, <WH776> The light <WH216> will shine <WH5050> on them.

Thou shalt multiply <WH7235> the nation, <WH1471> Thou shalt increase <WH1431> their gladness; <WH8057> They will be glad <WH8055> in Thy presence <WH6440> As with the gladness <WH8057> of harvest, <WH7105> As men rejoice <WH1523> when they divide <WH2505> the spoil. <WH7998>

For Thou shalt break <WH2865> the yoke <WH5923> of their burden <WH5448> and the staff <WH4294> on their shoulders, <WH7926> The rod <WH7626> of their oppressor, <WH5065> as at the battle <WH3117> of Midian. <WH4080>

For every <WH3605> boot <WH5430> of the booted <WH5431> warrior <WH5431> in the [battle] tumult, <WH7494> And cloak <WH8071> rolled <WH1556> in blood, <WH1818> will be for burning, <WH8316> fuel <WH3980> for the fire. <WH784>

For a child <WH3206> will be born <WH3205> to us, a son <WH1121> will be given <WH5414> to us; And the government <WH4951> will rest <WH1961> on His shoulders; <WH7926> And His name <WH8034> will be called <WH7121> Wonderful <WH6382> Counselor, <WH3289> Mighty <WH1368> God, <WH410> Eternal <WH5703> Father, Prince <WH1> of Peace. <WH8269>

There <WH369> will be no <WH369> end <WH7093> to the increase <WH4766> of [His] government <WH4951> or of peace, <WH7965> On the throne <WH3678> of David <WH1732> and over <WH5921> his kingdom, <WH4467> To establish <WH3559> it and to uphold <WH5582> it with justice <WH4941> and righteousness <WH6666> From then <WH6258> on and forevermore. <WH5703> <WH5769> The zeal <WH7068> of the Lord <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635> will accomplish <WH6213> this. <WH384>
The Lord <WH136> sends <WH7971> a message <WH1697> against Jacob, <WH3290> And it falls <WH5307> on Israel. <WH3478>

And all <WH3605> the people <WH5971> know <WH3045> [it,] [That is,] Ephraim <WH669> and the inhabitants <WH3427> of Samaria, <WH8111> Asserting <WH559> in pride <WH1346> and in arrogance <WH1433> of heart: <WH3824>

"The bricks <WH3843> have fallen <WH5307> down, <WH5307> But we will rebuild <WH1129> with smooth <WH1496> stones; <WH1496> The sycamores <WH8256> have been cut <WH1438> down, <WH1438> But we will replace <WH2498> [them] with cedars. <WH730>"
Therefore the Lord <WH3068> raises <WH7682> against <WH5921> them adversaries <WH6862> from Rezin, <WH7526> And spurs <WH5526> their enemies <WH340> on,

The Arameans <WH758> on the east <WH6924> and the Philistines <WH6430> on the west; <WH268> And they devour <WH398> Israel <WH3478> with gaping <WH3605> jaws. <WH6310> In [spite of] all <WH3605> this <WH384> His anger <WH639> does not turn <WH7725> away, <WH7725> And His hand <WH3027> is still <WH5750> stretched <WH5186> out.
Yet the people <WH5971> do not turn <WH7725> back <WH7725> to Him who struck <WH5221> them, Nor <WH3808> do they seek <WH1875> the Lord <WH3068> of hosts. <WH6635>
So the Lord <WH3068> cuts <WH3772> off <WH3772> head <WH7218> and tail <WH2180> from Israel, <WH3478> [Both] palm <WH3712> branch <WH3712> and bulrush <WH100> in a single <WH259> day. <WH3117>
The head <WH7218> is the elder <WH2205> and honorable <WH6440> <WH5375> man, And the prophet <WH5030> who teaches <WH3384> falsehood <WH8267> is the tail. <WH2180>
For those who guide <WH833> this <WH2088> people <WH5971> are leading <WH8582> [them] astray; <WH8582> And those who are guided <WH833> by them are brought <WH1104> to confusion. <WH1104>

Therefore <WH5921> <WH3651> the Lord <WH136> does not take <WH8055> pleasure <WH8055> in their young <WH970> men, <WH970> Nor <WH3808> does He have <WH7355> pity <WH7355> on their orphans <WH3490> or their widows; <WH490> For every <WH3605> one <WH3605> of them is godless <WH2611> and an evildoer, <WH7489> And every <WH3605> mouth <WH6310> is speaking <WH1696> foolishness. <WH5039> In [spite of] all <WH3605> this <WH384> His anger <WH639> does not turn <WH7725> away, <WH7725> And His hand <WH3027> is still <WH5750> stretched <WH5186> out.

For wickedness <WH7564> burns <WH1197> like a fire; <WH784> It consumes <WH398> briars <WH8068> and thorns; <WH7898> It even sets <WH3341> the thickets <WH5442> of the forest <WH9194> aflame, <WH3341> And they roll <WH55> upward <WH55> in a column <WH1348> of smoke. <WH6227>

By the fury <WH5678> of the Lord <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635> the land <WH776> is burned <WH6272> up, And the people <WH5971> are like fuel <WH3980> for the fire; <WH784> No <WH3808> man <WH376> spares <WH2550> his brother. <WH251>

And they slice <WH1504> off <WH1504> [what is] on the right <WH3225> hand <WH3225> but [still] are hungry, <WH7456> And they eat <WH398> [what is] on the left <WH8040> hand <WH8040> but they are not satisfied; <WH7646> Each <WH376> of them eats <WH398> the flesh <WH1320> of his own arm. <WH2220>

Manasseh <WH4519> [devours] Ephraim, <WH669> and Ephraim <WH669> Manasseh, <WH4519> [And] together <WH9191> they are against <WH5921> Judah. <WH3063> In [spite of] all <WH3605> this <WH384> His anger <WH639> does not turn <WH7725> away, <WH7725> And His hand <WH3027> is still <WH5750> stretched <WH5186> out.
